ch0301_00_hachikuman/0101_0701_02_10:
Come! I shall give you the honor of being trained
by me!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7101_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s a place of ideal dreams, where people and
Pokémon come together...
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7101_0701_02_10:
But I have no use for ideals OR dreams!
Mwahahaha!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7102_0701_02_10:
Ah! Sorry, didn’t see you there. I was trying to
focus and get into character.
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7102_0701_03_10:
...Or maybe you didn’t want to be noticed!
Sneaking up on your foe—how despicable!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7103_0701_01_10:
Wherever there is light, there is also shadow.
Heroes only exist because of villains like me!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7103_0701_02_10:
Without evil to fight against, they’d be nothing but
aimless dreamers!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7104_0701_01_10:
There are many people on this island who seek
truths and ideals...
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7104_0701_02_10:
Mwahaha! I will defeat them all and dye this
island in dark colors!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7105_0701_01_10:
Have you ever considered joining my side,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7105_0701_02_10:
Being a villain and fighting against those pesky
heroes isn’t such a bad gig, you know!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/7105_0701_03_10:
If we joined forces, Pasio could be as good as
ours!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/1701_0702_01_10:
Mwahahaha! How is it? Can’t you feel it filling
you with power?!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2501_0701_02_10:
The harder it is to battle against someone, the
more my dark can-do spirit fires up!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2501_0701_03_10:
Thus, I shall hereby regard you as my honorary
rival!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2501_0702_01_10:
Would you like to star in a Pokéstar Studios
movie together?
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2501_0702_02_10:
Mwahahaha! Fear not! If you don’t know how to
act, I know a man named Brycen who can
teach you!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2501_0702_03_10: He even tells me you’ve got talent!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, a lot of kids seem to think I’m actually
a bad guy just because I play the Masked Man.
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2511_0701_03_10:
Who cares?! For I am Brycen-Man, the one who
wanders through reality and phantasm!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2511_0702_01_10:
There is no greater joy than knowing you’ve
inspired people through your performance...
ch0301_00_hachikuman/2511_0702_02_10:
Er...I mean, that’s what that actor Brycen once
told me!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/3001_0701_01_10:
I am quite busy in the morning, so being quick is
my second nature. That’s how a great Masked
Man should be!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/3003_0701_01_10:
Mwahaha! My Pokémon party is in its best
condition today!
ch0301_00_hachikuman/3005_0701_01_10:
Nighttime is the best time for the Masked Man!
It raises my can-do spirit by a lot!
